Pre-Game Insights: The Washington Wizards face the Miami Heat in Mexico City on November 3, 2024.
The Miami Heat are favored to win with a BETMGM sportsbook line of Heat -7 and an over/under of 226.5.
Washington Wizards finished the previous season with a 15-67 overall record, 4-12 in Southeast Division action, and 7-34 at home.
Miami Heat finished the previous season with a 46-36 overall record and 13-3 in Southeast Division action.
Injuries for the Wizards include Saddiq Bey (knee), Malcolm Brogdon (thumb), and Kyle Kuzma (groin).
Injuries for the Heat include Duncan Robinson (personal), Kevin Love (personal), and Josh Richardson (day to day with a calf injury).
